name: Doctor Who Free Roam Prototype
description:
Welcome to Doctor Who Sandbox

This project is for players to test out features and this will be an active development with direct communication in comments and my discord server:  
https://discord.gg/KwhQzQNsVv

In these updates, you will be facing all sorts of threats, allies and various scenarios that you can interact with. This sandbox is not free-roam yet, I want to keep it small and confined so it does not stress the player out for learning purposes.
From Daleks, to Cybermen to the 2DIS to a power system.  

The twitter page has many progress pictures: https://twitter.com/TheKiwiKingdom_
